content.question: public String exercise(int input) { if (input < 10) { return "alpha"; } if (input < 5) { return "beta"; } if (input < 1) { return "gamma"; } return "delta"; } Assume that the int variable x has been initialized in another method in the same class. Which of the following describes the conditions under which the method call exercise(x) will return "gamma" ?

choices.label: The method will return "gamma" if x is less than 1.
The method will return "gamma" if x is between 1 and 4, inclusive.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
